title: Hexadecimal String Validation
description:
IS_HEX tests whether the string STR contains only hexadecimal characters
are. If another character is found the function returns FALSE. If in STR are
only hexadecimal characters included, the function returns TRUE. The heï¿¾xadecimal character are characters with the decimal code 0..9, a..f. and
A..F.
name: IS_HEX

input.name: str
input.description: The input string that needs to be validated as a hexadecimal string.

return_value.description: Indicates whether the input string is a valid hexadecimal string. Returns TRUE if all characters are hexadecimal, otherwise FALSE.
